/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street itself is lined with trees and buildings, creating a corridor of urban life. A black car is parked on the right side of the street, adding a touch of modernity to the scene. On the left side of the street, red banners flutter in the breeze, their vibrant color contrasting with the surrounding greenery. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, casting light and shadows that play across the scene.
